14112112.title: Goldfish Swallow

141121121.content:
"That's tough I'm afraid son." you say to the little boy in your hand. "I'm very hungry and you're very small. Time for us to carry on playing giants. This is the part where you go into my belly!"

Licking your lips, you raise Matt up to your mouth and slowly open it. Without hesitating you place his tiny body inside your mouth and seal him inside. You take a second to savour him, rolling him around on your tongue and releasing a loud "Mmmm". All the while you can feel him struggling and hear him shouting at you to stop.

Your stomach growls and you realise you're too hungry to wait for him any longer. You need him inside you now. You use your tongue to move Matt towards the back of your mouth and swallow hard. You feel him slowly move down your throat and eventually plop into your enormous belly.

You belch loudly and rub your tummy. You can still feel Matt and the goldfish wiggle and struggle inside you and the feeling makes you smile.

"You were just as yummy as I'd hoped, Matt," you say to your stomach. "But I'm still quite hungry. You rub your belly again, thoughtfully. Who can you have for desert?
141121121.title: Swallowing Matt

choices: Eat both now. They were nice enough to get out some fixings...
Eat one, and save the other for a snack later...
1411211211.content:
You hear your daughters come home in from outside through the backdoor in the kitchen, and your stomach growls again. You grab your ray, stick it behind your back, and head into the kitchen where you find 12 year old Lilly and 8 year old Amber searching the cabinets for a snack.

"Hi Daddy!" Amber chirps as you come in. Lilly, a moody little preteen, ignores your presence as she pulls out a jar of peanut butter. You just smile as both girls rummage through the fridge. Lilly pulls out a stalk of celery and Amber grabs chocolate syrup and whipped cream. You knew your daughter's favorite snacks well. Lilly was going to slather that peanut butter on a piece of celery, and Amber was partial to ice cream, which she was now pulling out of the fridge.

"Hey girls, guess what?" you say, reaching into a cabinet and pulling out two tall glasses, setting them on the counter.

"What?" Lilly said, finally looking at you. Your stomach growls again, and you step closer to your daughters.

"I got something today that I want to show you," you answer. Both girls look at you, wondering what you could possibly have. You grin, and quick as a flash, whip out the gun, and use it on the two. The smoke clears, and your now two inch tall daughters look up at you in horror. You reach down, and both scream as you gently scoop them into your hand. You gently set one in each glass.

"Dad, what happened!?" Lilly screeches. Amber just looks as though she's going to burst into tears.

"I got this shrink ray today! Isn't it cool?" you say, almost giddy.

"Why did you shrink us?" Lilly demanded.

"Because I want to play a game with you girls. It's a lot of fun, me and Matt played this afternoon."

"What kind of game?" Lilly asks suspiciously.

"Matt named it 'Giant'. You see, these kids wander into the castle of a giant, and if he catches them, then he gobbles them up. And I've just caught two tasty looking little girls!"

Lilly's eyes grow wide, and Amber huddles herself on the bottom of her glass. You just grin. What to do with your tiny captives?
1411211211.title: Go and find your daughters

14112112111.content:
"Now let's see, which tasty little morsel should I eat first?" You say, in the same deep voice you used while playing with Matt. Lilly looks up at you, then over to her terrified little sister, then back to you.

"It's just a game, right Dad?" she asks.

"Of course, sweetie. Just like a fairy tale, you don't need to be scared."

"Then you can eat me first."

You grab her glass and dump her into the palm of your hand. You raise her to your face, and playfully gnash your teeth at her. She nervously laughs a little as you tilt your head back, and dangle her over your open mouth. You're about to drop her into your gaping maw, when a better idea hits you. You lower her down to the counter, and grab the jar of peanut butter Lilly had left out.

"See, it's okay, Amber. He's just playing a game!" Lilly assures her sister, not noticing what you are doing. You open up the jar, and reach down and pick her up again.

"Wait Dad, what are you doing?" she asks, right before you dunk her into the jar. You pull her out, flailing as she tries to remove the sticky, sweet goo from herself.

"Just preparing my dessert. A sweet, peanut butter Lilly sounds pretty tasty," you say.

"Dad, you said it was a game!" She cried.

"It is a game, silly! This is the part of the game where the little girl goes into the hungry giant's belly!" you exclaim, raising her over your mouth again. He dropped her in, and moaned loudly as you licked the peanut butter off of her. She tasted even better than Matt had, mixing pleasantly with the peanut butter. You move her to the back of your throat, and you hear her give one last terrified squeal as you swallow her. She's slow going down your throat, but you eventually feel her land in your stomach. Newer, stronger struggles join your son's struggles, as you turn to your younger daughter.

Amber has started crying now, scared by watching you devour your sister.

"It's okay, baby girl. Lilly's with Matt now, right inside here," you say, patting your stomach. "I can feel them moving inside me." Amber cries harder, as you contemplate how to eat your last little girl. Lilly had been so tasty, and Amber was a much sweeter girl, so you were sure she would taste even better. You briefly consider dipping her in peanut butter like Lilly, but then you notice the ice cream, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream still sitting on the counter.

"Mmmm, I think I'll make my Amber into an ice cream treat!" you say cheerfully. You get into a cabinet and pull out a bowl for your ice cream. You're about to dump Amber into the bowl, when you look at her in the glass. You rather like the way she looks in there, not to mention you are a bit thirsty...



What do you do?
14112112111.title: Eat both now. They were nice enough to get out ...

choices: Go outside. Some of the neighbors look pretty good...
Wait for your wife to come home...
141121121111.content:
You set the glass back down, Amber still inside. You open up the container of ice cream, and put three scoops into the glass. You go to the fridge, and grab the bottle of root beer that your wife had bought yesterday. You open it up, and pour it into the glass. It fizzes up, and Amber, who had managed to climb to the top of the ice cream, cried out as she was pulled under by the liquid.

You grab a crazy straw from a drawer, and carry your treat into the living room. You watch as Amber resurfaces, trying desperately to grab on to something. She tried to latch on to one of the floating pieces of ice cream, but they just kept melting under her warm little body. You stick the straw into the glass, and she latches onto it.

"Daddy, please don't eat me!" Amber cried as you took a drink.

"I'm not going to eat you, silly! I'm going to drink you up!" you tease, taking another sip.

"Daddy, please!" she begs. You just smile, and stick your finger in the glass. You gently pat her on the head, and then scoop some ice cream up on your finger and lick it off.

"Don't worry, honey! You'll have fun in my tummy!" you assure her before taking another sip. "You'll have your brother and sister to play with. And with all of this root beer, it'll be like a giant pool inside Daddy."

You abandon the straw, and raise the glass to your mouth. You take a big gulp, and send about half of the glass's content down your throat. Amber is still left inside, treading frantically, trying to stay afloat.

"Yummy, yummy, yummy! Gonna have an Amber in my tummy!" you tease, taking the straw and poking her round little belly. She squeals in terror as you lift the glass towards your mouth. "Time to be inside Daddy now, sweetie pie!" You say, before gulping the rest of the contents down.

Amber went down much easier than the other two, aided by the beverage accompanying her. You gave a loud belch, as you rubbed you now full stomach. You had to admit, your kids were the best meal you ever had. He couldn't believe he hadn't thought of eating them before the shrink ray. You bet they would have been delicious stuffed and roasted or barbecued. Of course, then you wouldn't be able to enjoy the feeling of them struggling inside you.

Soon, far to soon, the struggles have stopped, and you're stomach is growling again. You decide to go looking for more people to eat.

Where do you decide to look?
141121121111.title: Make an Root Beer/Amber float...

1411211211112.content:
Several hours later, your wife Ellen comes home from work.

"Honey, are you still up?" she calls out. You go into the front hall to greet her. She is setting her purse down on the table in the hall, and you give her a little kiss on the cheek.

"How was work?" you ask, noticing that she seems to be hiding something behind her back.

"Long. Are the kids all in bed?" she asks. You chuckle and nod.

"I tucked them in a while ago." She smiles coyly.

"Good, cause I brought a little present for you..." she says, and from behind her back, she pulls out a small grey box. You get excited, because you know exactly what it is. Ellen knows all about your love of swallowing live things, and sometimes brings you home little critters from the pet store. You take the box from her, and sure enough, inside are four tiny white mice, squeaking and sniffing around.

"Mmmm, sounds good sweetheart. Why don't you take these little guys upstairs, and I'll be up in a minute?"

She smirks, and takes the box back from you. You know she isn't a big fan of your swallowing habit, but she's supportive, and seeing you so happy makes her horny. You almost always wind up having sex afterwards. As soon as she starts upstairs, you dash back into the living room and grab your ray. You dash up the stairs, and enter your bedroom. Ellen has already stripped into her underwear, and is looking at you with pure lust. You slowly close the door behind you.

Tonight, things are going to be interesting...
1411211211112.title: Ellen comes home

Before she could realize what was happening, you turned the ray on her, and shrunk her to three inches. You eagerly dive forward and grab her off of the bed. She stares up at you in utter confusion.

"What the HELL was that?" she screeched. You couldn't help but be amused by how utterly adorable her efforts to act tough were when she was this tiny.

"I got this shrink ray today? Neat, huh?" She just blinks up at you.

"Shrink ray?" she repeats, looking dumbfounded.

"I thought it might make for some fun games tonight," you explain, taking a finger and fondling her tiny breasts. Her minuscule nipples perk up, and she smiles up at you.

"And what kind of games did you have in mind?" she asks.

"I don't know... we'll come up with something. But right now, I'm hungry. We'll play later." You carefully sit her on the nightstand, and lay on your back on the bed, propped up on the pillows. You scoop her back into your hand and set her on your bare stomach. You then grab the grey box, and set it beside her on you stomach. Usually when you do this, you make her lay her head on your belly, and have her listen for the little animal inside. She didn't usually her anything, but with her at this size, every sound will be amplified, and she should be able to hear something.

"All righty then!" you say, rubbing your hands together in excitement. "Which of these tasty little morsels is the first to get eaten?"
14112112111121.title: Shrink her to 3 inches

141121121111211.content:
You reach into the box, and pull a little white mouse out by his tail. The animal began to squeal and try frantically to get away. You bring it to your mouth, open wide, and drop it in. You swallow immediately, and the wiggling lump slowly travels down you throat, and lands in you eager stomach. You look down at Ellen, who is staring at you nervously, much like Matt had when you swallowed the goldfish earlier. You suppose it must be a bit scary to see something about your size being swallowed by something over 150 times your size.

You decide then that tomorrow morning, after the mice have digested, Ellen will make a great breakfast in bed. Smirking at her, you reach down and gently push her into a laying position on your stomach.

"Might as well get comfy, sweetie. You've had a long day," you say as you reach into the box and grab another mouse. Ellen rolls on to her side and watches as you down this one as well. God, the feeling of the mice in your gut and her tiny form laying on you are making you unbelievably hard!

You grab another mouse, this one fights even harder then the first two, but you manage to get it down all right.

"Honey, I'm getting bored. Can't we do something else?" She groans. You pat her tiny head.

"I'm almost done, babe. Then we can play." You've been saving this mouse for last. The little animal was very plump, and looked especially tasty. Ellen moans, and stretches out. As she does, she accidentally bumps the box, and it falls to the floor. You quickly set her down on the bed, and dive for the escaping mouse. It's quick, too quick for you, and soon vanishes into a tiny crack in the wall behind the dresser.

Fantastic, it will probably get into the insulation, or worse, the wiring.

"Sweetie, I'm so sorry!" She exclaims as you sit down on the bed beside her. She lays her little head on your hand. "I promise, I'll get you another one tomorrow,"

You look down at her, and an idea crosses your mind.

"Its alright. I just thought of something else we can do..."

"Does it involve you turning me back to normal? It's very boring at this size..." she asks with a pout.

"Well how about we make it a bit more interesting? Chasing that mouse gave me an idea for a game!"

"What kind of game?"

"You'll be the mouse, and I'll be the big, scary, hungry cat," You explain, scooping her into your hand. "If you can escape me for five minutes, you get to do whatever you want to me tonight, and if I win, I get to do whatever I want to you." She grins, and nods her head.

"Okay, but you better be ready for me, stud, cause I'm gonna win!"

You set her on the floor, and reach for the alarm clock. You begin setting it to go off in five minutes. "One rule:" you say as you punch the buttons. "You have to stay in this room. No crawling into cracks or under the door."

"No problem!" she says confidently.

"Ready... Set... GO!" You hit the alarm button and dive to the ground.
141121121111211.title: You reach in to the box and grab a mouse

1411211211112111.content:
She manages to evade you for a while, but you eventually manage to corner her. You snatch her up just as the alarm goes off.

"Good job, sweetie!" she says, panting from exhaustion. You sit on the bed, and lay back down. You set her back on your stomach, and let her catch her breath.

"So what are you going to do with me?" She asks. You smile.

"Well, what do cats usually do with the mice they catch?" You ask. She looks confused.

"I don't..."

"They eat them up, don't they? And you're such a yummy looking mousy..." you explain. She still doesn't seem to understand.

"You mean that you want to... EAT me?" she asks.

"That's right. You're so perfect, and you always taste so good..."

"You can't be serious? You just mean you want to eat me out, right?"

"No, silly," you say, grabbing her under her arms and bringing her closer to your face. "I'm going to eat you UP. You're going to spend tonight all snug and warm in my stomach." You raise her up, and open your mouth wide...

"NO! You can't do this!" she screams, kicking her tiny legs in the air.

"Why not? I said if I won the game, I got to do whatever I wanted to you. You agreed, remember?"

"I didn't know that you were going to EAT ME!"

"You didn't ask. That's not my fault. And besides, since you're the one who let that mouse get away, I think it's only fair for you to replace it."

"NO! NO!" she screeched. "Please, I'll buy you a new one tomorrow! I'll buy you a whole cage of them!"

"But I'm hungry now. I need another mouse in my belly!" And with that, you open your mouth wide, and drop your screaming wife inside.

You suck on her for a while, tossing her about with your tongue. You thought your children tasted good, but they were nothing compared to her! You gently roll her around your mouth, savoring the sweet taste. After a few minutes of bliss, you carefully move her into position and swallow her down. She slowly makes her way to your eager stomach, her brand new home, and you fall asleep with the thought of her curling up safe and warm inside you as she awaited her fate, and her sweet taste still in your mouth.

At first normal food was enough, but slowly new thoughts began to come to you. When you were eight years old you came to realize how much you loved the slight shifting of food within your belly, and you only wished it could be stronger. For a time you began experimenting with pop-rocks and fizz candies, trying to find the perfect way of amusing your stomach. However none of them lived up to expectations. This led you to simply eat bugs. At first the thought was a bit gross, and the taste wasn't so great, but it was rather satisfying. This kept you interesting until a year ago, shortly after your tenth birthday. The tiny bugs just weren't doing it for you anymore, you needed something bigger. From the start you had at times dreamed about eating people whom you did not like, but it slowly became an obsession. As you reached the deepest parts of your longing you recieved the offer. The letter came in a simple envelope with no return address. It contained a schematic for a strange weapon which, it claimed, could shrink anything. With your mouth practically watering you began to put the device together. Fortunatly you were naturally adept with machinery and it did not take long. While still skeptical, you tested the ray on a chair. Sure enough it shrank to a virtually unnoticible size! It felt like a dream, your head spun from anticipation, but you fully intended to indulge your hunger.

Downstairs you could hear the TV, and your older siblings laughing at what it was showing. Your brother, Mark, and sister, Charlotte, treated you like dirt. Glancing at the weapon in your hands, you decided they would be perfect targets to properly test it out.

You slid down the banister of the stairs and landed with a light thud. Mark instantly shouted, "Keep it down squirt!" You hated being called that. You walked into the living room and stood in front of the TV, instantly causing Mark and Charlotte to protest.
"Move it pipsqueak!" Charlotte yelled.
"Yeah, before I force you to move," Mark warned.
"Oh," you say, "I don't think you're in a position to do anything to me." You point your shrink gun at your brother.
"You think your little toy gun can hurt me? I'll show you how to hurt someone." Mark jumped off the chair and dived for you, but you were too quick. You fire the gun, hitting him in the head which meant the ray did not affect his clothing. He went from being six foot two to only one inch tall in seconds, and landed in a pile of his own clothes. Charlotte screamed and tried to run out the door, but you fired the gun and hit her back. Her clothes shrunk along with her since the ray hit them, and you were careful not to shrink her as small, stopping once she reached about three inches.

You stepped over to her and picked her up, then retrieved your tiny brother. Taking a seat on the settee, you sat quite low so you could put your siblings on your stomach. Charlotte looked quite odd with clothes on, so you grab the top of her shirt and pull forward, tearing it right off, and proceeded to do the same with her skirt and underwear. You rubbed your growling stomach and licked your lips with anticipation. Even though they knew what was going to happen, Mark asked, "What are you going to do with us?"

"I feel very hungry right now... You would both make perfect meals. But who should I eat first?" You say with a playful laugh. They cower as your hand moves slowly towards them.

"Excellent! Come on, I'll get you an ice cream."

15133.title: Wait until the party tonight...

choices: Wait around - Mum returns wondering where everyone is
A whole street in your room
151331.content:
Come to think of it, why mask the delicious taste of people with ice cream, you think as your dad leads you out of the door. He gets in the car.
"Come on, we'll be late!"
You fire the gun at the car and stare in wonder as the car and its contents decrease in size. Your dad looks out in terror as he watches everything around him get bigger, and screams when he sees you licking your giant lips right outside the car window. Lying flat on your stomach, you place your finger on the roof of the car and giggle, thoroughly enjoying your dad's terrified screams and expressions as the roof easily crumples. You push in the back side first then slide your finger across the roof towards your dad's seat, pushing him as far forward as you could without injuring him too badly. You still want him alive enough to wriggle in your stomach.

Once he appears completely stuck, you pinch the roof together and peel it away, revealing your tasty frightened morsel. You pluck him from his seat, hurting him slightly as you tear him away from his seatbelt. However unknown to you your dad currently holds a large shard of glass he managed to grab before you lifted him, and as you hold him over your mouth he throws in the shard. It slices through your tongue quite deep, making you scream in pain and in turn you drop your dad.

You pull the glass out and grab a small amount of your tshirt and shove it into your mouth, applying a lot of pressure onto the wound. Your dad tries to make a run for it, but your free hand is too quick for him, and you slam down upon his fragile body hard, although just soft enough so he was still alive.
"Mow 'oo 'istem 'ere," your voice is incredibly muffled through the t-shirt, and the dark tone your voice has is visibly distressing your father, "'o amyfin' 'ike fat again an' 'our 'ast memory will be of flyimg fas' an' far through the air!"

You wait until the bleeding slows to a trickle before placing your father above your mouth again. You dropped him in and closed your mouth around his two inch tall body. Not taking too long to play with him in your mouth, since your tongue was still bleeding slightly, you swallow him and sigh as he falls down your gullet. You bend down to face your stomach.
"Say hello to Mark and Charlotte for me!" You say and giggle.
151331.title: You can't help yourself - Shrink dad now

choices: Mum comes home, looking for your missing dad
1513312.content:
You had a crazy idea, one which you just had to live out. You fired the gun at every building on your street. You jumped up and down clapping your hands at your handy work, unable to contain your excitement. You run around collecting the houses, having to make multiple trips to get them all into your house. Eventually you have filled your living room with your entire street.

"Hello!" You bellow, sending everyone into panic, "I am Kyle, your new master! Firstly, let me tell you the rules. If you disobey a command, you will die. If you true to escape, you will die. If you resist against me making physical contact with you, you will die."
Already two people, two teenagers who were friends of your sister, started running across the carpet. You easily snatched them up without leaving your eye from the little street you had stolen.

"Apparently, you need a demonstration. If you abide by my rules, this won't happen to you."
You lift the first teen up, a girl about the age of 16, and place her waist high in your mouth. You suddenly begin to suck, hard, causing first her clothes to fall off, then her legs to tear right from their sockets. You spit the girl out, allowing the remaining half of her body to land and roll across the carpet, through your little street.
"That could be your fate... Or this could be."
You take off your sock, which you've been wearing for over a week now. You weren't overly fussed if your feet smelled. You take the second teen, a boy of age 17, and put him in, then your foot quickly follows.
"He will spend the day in here while I play with you all. Remember, there are many other places I can put you too. I suggest you don't test me to find them out."
To show your strength, you lift up the building the two teens ran out of and crush it between each hand, allowing the debris to fall into your street. You also notice two now dead bodies of a middle aged couple fall too.
"That was just bad luck for them. Right. Okay everyone, get into your houses."

The rest of the street, probably around fifty people living in twenty houses, reluctantly entered their houses by your command. The power you had over them felt incredible. You pick up the other half of the girl whose legs you tore off, and decided to finish her off. She was barely moving, but just the thought of her being in your stomach was enough.
1513312.title: A whole street in your room

151332.content:
You sit in the corner of the hall, licking away happily at your ice cream. The music is incredibly loud, but you don't mind. You've always loved loud thumping music, since the bass sent vibrations through your stomach. In your pocket you feel the shrink device, and you are ready to whip it out and begin shrinking people, but you need to wait for an opportunity when everyone is in the room.

You think back to shrinking your brother and sister. Hitting the clothes made them shrink with them, but hitting skin left the clothes alone. You wonder if shooting the building outside would affect everything inside it too. Strolling outside, you experiment and shoot the building briefly, reducing it to three quarters its normal size. Peering through the window, you laughed as you watch the midgets dancing around, all of them completely oblivious to their reduced size. You step back and continued to fire the gun, your laughs getting louder and louder to them until it was a huge rumble. The electrics of the building quickly stopped working as electrical wires were being shrunk and pulled away.

The sounds of panic that filled the building fill you with joy, and you take a step toward the shrunken building, slamming your foot down as hard as you can. Everyone inside toppled from the shock, and began to scream hysterically as you crouch down to peer through the windows. You slowly lick your lips as you lift the building with ease. You remove your parents from the building and place them in your ice cream, then fire the gun at the building again, reducing it further. Once it was the size of a large bottle, you tear one side off and pour the many party goers into your mouth like a drink. They feel weird as they slid down your throat, being no where near as difficult to swallow as your siblings. The eighth of an inch tall people's screams went unheard, and their tiny size only made it a filling meal. The real pleasure would be from your currently four inch tall parents.

You reduce the building even further so you can fit it in your mouth, and chew on it. Anyone left inside exploded in tiny dots of blood which you can just about taste as you swallow. Once you finish the building, you grin at your shivering, ice cream covered parents. You lift your ice cream and walk away, licking them while happily humming.

"Son, what have you done!?" Your father screams furiously. You just look at him in awe. How can someone so small still fight, you think.
"What I have done is shrunk you down, along with your friends, and eaten them. Now I get the pleasure of eating you too!"
"Kyle, please! Don't! Why would you eat your own parents?" your mum asks, a lot calmer than your dad.
"I've always loved the wriggly feeling food gives me. Unfortunately, as I grew older, satisfying that need for the feeling got harder because my stomach got increasingly larger. So I started eating bugs, but even they got too small for me. Now, with this device," he showed his parents the control, "I can satisfy it as long as people and animals inhabit this planet."
"You can't do this Kyle, it's wrong!"
"Then why do I feel so good when I do it? If it's wrong, I love being bad!" You then grab your mother from the ice cream and lick her clean, ignoring her protests. Once you got all the ice cream off, you finished her off.
"Son, Kyle, please, don't eat me!" your father pleaded.
"But I'm still hungry! I didn't eat any lunch so I would have room to eat everyone here!" You chomp down on the ice cream around your dad, lifting him up in your mouth. You hold him in your mouth as the ice cream melts and dribbles down your throat. Upon swallowing you get a horrible feeling in the back of your mouth.

Your dad had grabbed hold of your uvula and was using it to prevent him from being eaten. The resulting tugs caused you to throw up, releasing your mother from her prison. At least the other people you ate had already dissolved because they were too small to survive your stomach acids. You picked up the sick soaked man sprawled over the floor.
"My food is only allowed to fight once it gets to the stomach!" you scream, causing you dad to clutch at his now ringing ears. In anger, you tighten your grip and wind your arm back, flick your entire body around and release your dad, sending him flying incredibly far through the air. He landed about fifty metres in front of you with a tiny squelch. You snatched your mother up and swallowed her again, and now her struggling inside your stomach felt even better as there was no acid left to suppress the tiny movement of her feet.

You walk away, rubbing your stomach, and return home. It was getting late anyway, and tomorrow would be a whole new feast.
151332.title: Fun times at the party...

choices: Let her leave... Tomorrow the fun continues...
Give in to your lust - Shrink her now
1513322.content:
You can not help yourself. You could not go a whole night without feeling something wriggling around. As you reach your home, you notice someone was at the door. It was Alice, the daughter of the people next door. Your brother Mark had been going out with her for a while, and his hatred of you had rubbed off on Alice.

"Hey, brat!" She calls across the road at you, "where's your brother at? We were supposed to be going to see a film while the folks were partying."
You chuckle, remembering you thought you had lied to your parents, telling them that Mark did not want to go to the party.
"I guess I should tell you the truth. I ate him," You reply, grinning as you close in on Alice.
"Don't joke about that, you sick brat!"
"Who's joking?" You ask as you point the gun at her, aiming for her face.
"Uh... What's that?" She asks nervously.
"It's a shrink ray. I am going to shoot you with it and you will shrink to about three or four inches tall. I will then swallow you, as I am quite hungry thanks to my dad."
"You ate your parents!?" She asked, sweating and shaking.
"Only my mother. My dad decided to grab onto the dangly thing at the back of my mouth and made me throw up, so I threw him as far as I could. He smashed across the pavement with a nice small squelch."
"Kyle, you're really freaking me out, let me go home, please," she pleaded as she started to move away from the door.
"I can't let you do that, you know too much."
"I don't even know if that gun of yours works, but please, let me go home, I promise you I won't say anything to anyone."
You think this over... Maybe you should wait until tomorrow. The wait might make her feel better in your stomach.
1513322.title: On the way home...

15133221.content:
You answer her, your tone and facial expression incredibly low and dark, scaring even yourself, "Fine, go. But if I find out you've mentioned a word of this to anyone, I will do things to you that not even your worst nightmares can live up to."
She did not say anything, but Alice nods slightly as if to say thank you. You turn your head to follow her movements all the way to her house. You stare through the windows and just about see that she goes straight to her bedroom. You walk into your house and head up to your brother's room whose window faces Alice's.

After struggling to pull Mark's large bed towards the window so you can keep an eye on Alice, you lie down and watch her climb in to bed. She notices you watching and goes to close the curtains, but a simple shake of the head makes her turn back to bed.

After a few hours your young brain switches itself off and you fall fast asleep, however Alice stays awake in fear of what you have in store for her tomorrow.
15133221.title: Let her leave... Tomorrow the fun continues...

151332211.content: You jerk awake when the doorbell rings loudly, it's horrible noise passing through the entire house. Mark's room was the furthest away from it too. You angrily slide your feet along the floor and make your way slowly downstairs, shrink gun in hand, not caring who it was who rang. As you open the door, you reveal...

Alice had prepared for your arrival
1513322112.content:
...Alice's parents!? "That bitch!" you mutter.
"Excuse me, but where are your parents? We want to talk to them about your, quite frankly, rude and inadequate behaviour."
"I'm sorry, they're not available."
"Well then, we'll just talk to you. We do not accept little kids scaring our daughter with your stupid fantasy ideas of shrink guns. She's a teenager for crying out loud! She shouldn't be coming to us at three in the morning, waking us up, explaining how her ten year old-"
"Eleven year old," You correct them.
"-Eleven year old neighbor is going to shrink and eat her. Explain yourself!"
"Well... If you insist." You pull the shrink gun out and shoot them both, giving neither a chance to react. Instinctively you place your bear foot on them, knocking both onto their backs and trapping them under your huge toes.

"That idiot daughter of yours is going to get it. I warned her, very specifically, that if I found out she told anyone, I would destroy her. I'm not giving her any chances. She blew her only chance. You two will be the first part of her punishment." You pick up your tiny neighbors and bring them with you to their home. The door was slightly open, so you barged through it.
1513322112.title: Alice's parents

choices: Alice feels it's too dangerous to keep you alive
15133221122.content:
"ALI-oof" You started to scream angrily, but as you push through the slightly ajar door, a brick falls from it's place on top of it and hits you square in the head, knocking you unconscious.

About an hour later, you slowly wake up, hoisted very high up above the ground. Your hands were tied to a sheet of cardboard with string and paper clips to hold your naked form there, and a small amount of blutack attaching you to the ceiling. You could already feel the cardboard beginning to slip, so you refrained from struggling, it wouldn't matter if you broke free anyway. It was a clear hundred foot drop to the carpet below, and you didn't want to risk how soft the landing might, or might not, be.

Looking around, you could tell that the bed in the corner of the room was Alice's, so you guessed you were in her room. At that moment the door swings open, and Alice and her regrown parents enter the room through it.
"How did you get them back to normal?" you ask.
"It's not difficult to reverse a circuit. Luckily the design allowed me to simply put the batteries in the wrong way and it worked. Now," she throws the device across the room, smashing it into many pieces across the wall.
"NO!" You scream.
"You were stupid to come here. You think I would not have prepared for your arrival? Stupid brat." She slams her fist into your stomach. You were about six inches tall, so the punch wasn't too damaging, however the way she kept her fist there and ground you into the ceiling did hurt. Apparently it was just to fix the blutack a bit better.

"Alice," her parents said simultaneously, "We're sorry."
"For not believing you about that freak," her dad continus, pointing at you.
"It's alright, I could barely believe it myself. But now, we get to decide how we will punish him."
Alice reaches up and curls her fingers around your back and tugs, releasing the grip of the paperclips on the cardboard. As she holds you, the paperclips pull heavily on your arms, but she only smiles at your cries of pain.
"You, little boy, need to learn that being small isn't a good thing."
"What... What are you going to do with me?" You ask nervously.
15133221122.title: Alice had prepared for your arrival

151332211221.content:
"Hmm... You know, I've always wanted a new pet. Can I keep him mum?"
"That brat deserves it! Of course you can dear."
Alice squeals and pulls out her old hamster cage. It was covered in dust but mostly clean.
"What happened to the hamster!?" you squeak. You're ignored as you are lifted and placed roughly into the top hatch of the cage. You land in a heap on the floor, rolling around randomly as Alice dumps the cage on her bedside table. The dust jumps into the air, making it hard for you to breath for a while.

"Just remember to take good care of him. Wait... What am I saying? Treat him like the pile of dirt he is," her mother says before she leaves with Alice's father. Alice lies on her bed and looks into the cage.
"You look incredibly cute at that size. All small and helpless. Think, if I, say, forget to refill your water bottle or neglect to feed you, you'll pass away slowly and horribly. With just water, you'll last about a week without proper nourishment. That would make up for all the people you've eaten."

Despite her warnings, Alice grew quite attached to you, fed you regularly and properly and took care of you like a proper pet. Unfortunately, that's exactly how she treated you for many of the early years, as a pet. She would rarely say anything to you, anything she did say would be incredibly patronising, and she would stroke and play with you like a pet. It wasn't until a few years later that she started properly talking to you again, during your mid teenage years, however the conversations were often short and normally ended in Alice using your small body for her own personal pleasures. These were often the only times you felt were worth it, but the novelty of being used to pleasure a giantess wore off as she got more vigorous with you. Apparently the reduced size also increased your metabolism, although you were careful about asking for more food when you finished off a bowl. The few times you ever did, or anything that angered Alice including one attempted escape, involved a harsh punishment, ones which left you an almost immobile cripple for days on end.

Due to your metabolism increase, you eventually started to die at about 22 years old, when Alice was 28.
"I hope you enjoyed your life, my little pet. I hope you enjoyed having it taken from you. And I sure as hell hope you enjoyed having to live without that life."
Those are the last words you hear from her. The last thing you see is a large hand pulling you out of your cage and dangling you over a giant mouth. Feeling old and tired, and knowing she was right, that your life had been wasted, you don't bother fighting.

You don't even make a peep as Alice's stomach slowly digests you, despite the horrible pain.

"Sorry," you whisper, as if talking to all the people you ate all those years ago, "Sorry for taking your lives."

Your vision goes black as guilt overwhelms you and your pathetic life ends.
151332211221.title: Alice lets you live

15133222.content: Your stomach was leading your actions, and makes your finger pull the trigger. She shrinks out of her clothes and lay trapped under a small t-shirt and once skin tight trousers. You fish through them and found her cowering naked body, staring in awe at her beauty. Even at only eleven years old you could see she was stunning, and could see why your brother liked her so much. You chew your bottom lip while licking across the back of it as you probe her body with your finger, wondering if you should sate your hunger, or perhaps do something different with her.
15133222.title: Give in to your lust - Shrink her now

151332221.content:
"Say... you were looking for my brother weren't you. Well, you two can be reunited in my stomach. Kinda." You 'reassured' your brothers girlfriend. You lifted her above your mouth and slathered your tounge across your bottom lip once more, she frantically contested against your powerful fingers and screamed. "NO PLEASE. DON'T DO IT. IF-IF YOU EAT ME MY PARENTS WILL GET YOU!!"
"Fine by me, I'll eat them too!" You released the tension after that cold statement. She tried pleading for more time but her pleas were silenced as soon as you snapped your mouth shut with a 'click' she was roughed about in your mouth as your tounge got to work on absorbing her flavour. Inside your gut she screamed as the liquids began to degrade he beauty and make it yours... *BUUUURP* you bellowed her last breaths into he night...
151332221.title: Eat her

choices: Your friends are at the door... Perfect!
153.content:
You paced around your room, head still spinning. You had a working shrink gun! All the possibilities went through your head, however your thoughts kept turning to your next door neighbors. They had never been particularly nice to you or your family. A grin spread across your face as you thought of the gruesome revenge you could get on them if they were only a few inches tall.

Luckily your house was detached and had a side window which faced your neighbor's house, meaning you did not have to go outside and possibly reveal your new weapon to anyone. Not entirely certain if it would work, you fired the gun at the bricks of the house. A thin blue beam shot out and began to spread, covering the entire house. Once the house was glowing in a thin blue light, it rapidly diminished in size. You didn't want to shrink it too much, as devouring your neighbors wouldn't be much fun if they were too small.

You let go of the gun and looked down at the house. It was barely two feet tall. You quickly run out and pick the house up, being careful not to damage your meal inside. Surprised at how light weight and fragile it is, considering your grip was cracking the walls quite easily, you gently place it down on your bedroom floor. No one else was in the house, meaning you could have a lot of fun without interuptions.

Your stomach began to rumble and your mouth began to water in anticipation of what was to come. You slowly peeled away the roof of the house which many would mistake to be a dolls house now, and looked inside. You lick your lips at the many tasty meals, thoroughly enjoying the fact your neighbors decided to have a few friends round. Already your neighbors were screaming and quickly fled downstairs, but you knew that wouldn't be enough to save themselves. You tore away the second story, revealing around ten people, all huddled together in a corner. The man of the house, Eric, stood up having realised who you were.

"You're that kid from next door! Kyle! What are you doing!?" Eric was in obvious panic, but you did not care. All you could think about was the emptiness of your stomach and how these tasty people were going to fill it. You plucked the frightened man between your thumb and forefinger and slowly brought him up to your mouth. Opening wide, you tilted your head and hung him over it, hesitating for a few seconds before dropping him in. His screams quickly quietened as you started playing about with him with your tongue. It ran over his tiny, wriggling body, each time giving you a slight shiver of pleasure. Not being able to wait any longer, you sealed the man's fate and swallowed Eric, gasping in happiness as you feel the man's fighting body creep down your throat. He landed in your stomach with a tiny plop and began thrashing around, trying to punch his way through your stomach walls, trying to cause some form of pain, unknown to him that this was exactly what you wanted.

You lower your eyes down to the remains of the house, scanning across the small selection of three inch tall snacks. You began to feast, picking them up one by one, playing with them in your mouth for a bit before swallowing. The last thing you ate was Alice, the girl you knew your older brother had a great crush on. She was sixteen and if you were a bit older, you would probably find incredibly attractive. However right now she was just a very good looking wriggling meat stick. You did however take more time on her, half as a way of getting back at her for being horrible to you whenever she visited to see your brother, and as a way for getting back at him for displaying the same attitude all the time. You stripped her of her clothes and began playing with her body like a toy, moving her limbs into different positions. When you brought her up to eat her, you licked her entire front body slowly, allowing her tiny breasts to rub against your taste buds. The feeling was good, but you knew there was a much nicer feeling, and you proceeded to finish her off by throwing her into the air and catching her in your mouth, and swallowing her quickly.

You picked up the broken house and hid it under your bed so anyone who comes into your room won't get suspicious. It was already bad enough that an entire house had disappeared from the street. You pick the gun up and smile, wondering what you should do next with such power.
153.title: Test it out on a neighbors house.

154.content:
You decide that it would be fun to wait until tomorrow, when school starts. Finally, a Monday that isn't so boring!

You sleep incredibly peacefully through the night, and are the first to be ready tomorrow morning. Your older brother and sister look at you with disgust, while your younger brother just makes spit bubbles at you. The older ones start to mock you for being a nerd, but you don't care. The funny thing is that both your older siblings went to your school albeit in the last year group while you only just started high school a month ago. The new kids were always treated badly by the older kids. Today you were going to show them who's boss.

As your parents drop you and your older siblings off you smile and walk with a proud stride in your step. Your best friend sees you and questions your happiness, so you get him to follow you to the toilets. Oliver, your friend, is a short, skinny, stereotypical nerd, minus the glasses. He has very short blonde hair and green eyes and he currently wore a pair of thin army camo shorts and a dull green t-shirt.

"Why did you bring me in here?" he asks.
"You wanted to know why I was so happy, and this is why," you reply as you rummage through your bag and pull out the shrink device.
"Whoa, that's a cool toy. It's like a phaser gun!" Oli said.
"It's better than that. Watch what happens when I shoot something." You see one boy just finishing up on the toilet. He is a few years older and shoves past both of you. You shoot him in the back just before he gets out the door and Oli gasps as the boy suddenly dropped to a couple of inches tall. You go over and pick the screaming boy up as he furiously but uselessly punches at your fingers.
"A shrink ray!?" Oli yells as you place the boy in his palm, "Well aren't you the cutest little thing," he says as he starts to stroke and prod the boy.
"Watch this," you say as you take the boy back and dangle him over your mouth. He screams harder than ever before in his life as he falls. You don't even bother playing with him, you swallow him the moment he hits the back of your throat. Oliver just stares in wonder, until you point the gun at him.
"W-what are you doing!?" Oli squeals.
"You've been such a good friend to me over the last month. However, with this new found power, my almost never ending hunger and your fighting, wriggling body, our friendship must end."
"Please, wait! I... Must confess. I've also had thoughts of eating tiny people." You began to lower the device. "Ever since I watched the Borrowers, I've thought about it a lot. Please, let me fulfill my fantasy first, while I can."

You think if this is a good idea.
154.title: Devour your entire class.

1541.content:
In your lust for wriggly food, you nearly forgot that Oliver is your friend, but now you just couldn't do this to him, and point the gun away from your friend.
"Thank you..." he sighs.
"It's funny, I've had the same fantasies. That jock I just ate is banging his fists on my stomach, trying to get out. It's pathetic," you say, directing your voice to your stomach for the last two words.

Just then, two boys come in.
"Move it brat," your brother says and shoves you out the way, while his friend does the same to Oliver.
"Ready for your first meal?" you ask. Oliver nods enthusiastically and you shoot your brother. His friend yells in shock and looks at you, but you fire the gun at him before he has time to run. You pick up your brother and tell Oli to grab his friend.
"Hello there little one," you mock, holding your frightened brother up high. You quickly drop him in your mouth and suck on his body, reveling in how delightful he tastes. Oli follows suit, and soon you are both making sounds of satisfaction as your gulp them down. Oliver lifts his shirt, revealing his incredibly skinny body, and you can see tiny bumps forming on his abdomen as your brother's friend pounds on his stomach wall.
"Aw man that feels so good! More!" Oli begs. You too want more, and are delighted when you hear the bell ring. You have an idea and bring Oli outside once everyone else was in the building. Aiming at the school's wall, you fire, and a huge blue light covers the entire school. In seconds, the school reduces in size, ending up where the school's roof only came up to Oliver's waste. Unable to contain himself, Oliver tears into the building, revealing a large group of seniors. He licked his lips and started shoveling the tiny, screeching people into his mouth, tasting each one a little before swallowing. He leaves you with half of the class, and you look at his now bulging, moving stomach.
"You have a lot of people in there," you say.

You do the same and eat the rest of the class, including the teacher, however they weren't nearly as visible through your skin. You ask Oliver what he wants to do now.
"I think we should..."
1541.title: Keep him big, shrink the next person who comes...

info.brief_description: You shrink and swallow your victims
info.description:
You posess a shrink gun that allows you to shrink people down to a given size. You use this machine to shrink and swallow your victims.

Here are the rules:
*Victims may be male or female
*Predators must ALWAYS be male
*No overly gross sex scenes

Other than that, HAVE FUN!
